markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Incredible Companion (Ranger)](/Feats.aspx?ID=520) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 175 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Mature Animal Companion (Ranger)](/Feats.aspx?ID=508)

</column>

---

Your animal companion continues to grow and develop. It becomes a [nimble or savage animal companion](/companions/animal-companions/advanced-options) (your choice), gaining additional capabilities determined by the type of companion.

<title level="2">Incredible Companion (Ranger) leads to...</title>
[Specialized Companion (Ranger)](/Feats.aspx?ID=538)
name: Incredible Companion (Ranger)
